description: Create a project transport location event type.
permissions: Authorization is delegated to the related project transport event type. Creation requires an event type with a broker and the user must be an admin or a manager who is a member of that broker.
side_effects: Creates a project transport location event type linking a project transport location to a project transport event type.
validation_notes: --project-transport-location and --project-transport-event-type are required and must be non-empty. The combination of project_transport_location_id and project_transport_event_type_id must be unique.

flags.name: --project-transport-event-type
flags.description: Project transport event type ID (required). Example: 456.
